summary: Three aging and failed comedians, Georges Cox, Victor Vialat and Eddie Carpentier, hit the road again with a lousy production of a lousy play, of course under the worst possible conditions.
cast: Jean-Pierre Marielle|Philippe Noiret|Jean Rochefort|Catherine Jacob|Michel Blanc|Clotilde Courau|Pierre-Arnaud Juin|Jacques Mathou|Marie Pillet|Jacques Nolot|Jean-Marie Galey|Olivier Pajot|Claude Derepp|Nathalie Krebs|Laurence Ragon|Louis-Marie Audubert|Luc Distelmans|Fabien Béhar|Romain Lhabib|Delphine De Malherbe|Isabelle Petit-Jacques|Dominique Besnehard|Albert Delpy|Florence Geanty|Clément Amaury|Alain Asanovic|Julien Bukowski|Max Desrau|Pierre Devilder|Etienne Draber|Georges Eon|José Fumanal|Philippe Gauguet|Arsène Jiroyan|Michel Jurbet|Bob Lampion|Laurence Lerel|Guillaume Rannou|Fabrice Schwarzel|Gérard Sergue|Isabelle Spade
keywords: aging|times square manhattan new york city|bankruptcy|actor playing female role|cross dressing
title: Cómicos en apuros
